title: Pizza Express is everyone’s 'last resort' restaurant: it's where I had my final meal with my father
text:
When it was revealed, this week, that Pizza Express was in talks with creditors that could force the chain to fold (cue a hundred calzone jokes), there was an immediate online outpouring of love and pain. Suddenly everyone stopped fighting over Brexit and united over the potential loss of what was now deemed a national treasure.

But scratch the surface, and the cries of #SavePizzaExpress that echoed through social media belied a deeper truth: those calling loudest to save the chain have not visited a site for years. They’re not crying for the restaurant, but for nostalgia.
